publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2082 Tommy Sheridan: G8 Summit—That the Parliament notes with concern the decision by Italian and British authorities to refuse access to Italy to a number of Scottish peace and anti-globalisation campaigners; considers this to be a very sinister and unacceptable development; condemns the decision of these authorities to refuse Scottish citizens their legal right to participate in legitimate protest, and calls upon the Minister for Justice to conduct a full enquiry into these incidents in order to provide answers and explanations.
